channel.title: RMDB entries
channel.description: The RNA Mapping Database is a repository of experimental results on RNA structural probing using mapping (a.k.a. footprinting) techniques. This feed lists the current entries on the database.

item.title: RMDB ETOBCR_SHP_0002
item.description: Chemical mapping data for the EteRNA design project. Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB X20H20_DMS_0001
item.description: Data associated with Figure 2(c) in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy for Inferring Base Pairs in Structured Nucleic Acids: Proof of Concept on a DNA/RNA Helix, Biochemistry (2010)." Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB X20H20_DMS_0002
item.description: Data associated with Figure S1(b) in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy for Inferring Base Pairs in Structured Nucleic Acids: Proof of Concept on a DNA/RNA Helix, Biochemistry (2010)." Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB SRPDIV_DMS_0001
item.description: Data associated with Figure 2 and Supplementary Figure 6 in Das, R., Karanicolas, J., Baker., D (2010) "Atomic accuracy in predicting and designing noncanonical RNA structure". Nature Methods 7:291-294. Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_SHP_0002
item.description: Data associated with Figure S1C in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." SHAPE Data acquired by W. Kladwang Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_NMD_0002
item.description: Data associated with Figure S1F in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." SHAPE Data acquired by W. Kladwang Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_CMC_0001
item.description: Data associated with Figure 1 & Figure S1B in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." CMCT Data acquired by R. Das Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_CMC_0002
item.description: Data associated with Figure S1E in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." CMCT Data acquired by W. Kladwang Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_DMS_0001
item.description: Data associated with Figure 1 & Figure S1A in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." DMS Data acquired by R. Das Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_DMS_0002
item.description: Data associated with Figure 1 & Figure S1A in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." DMS Data acquired by R. Das Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB MDLOOP_STD_0000
item.description: Data associated with Figure 2 in "A Mutate-and-Map Strategy Accurately Infers the Base Pairs of a 35-Nucleotide Model RNA" by Kladwang, Cordero, Das, RNA (2011)." DMS and CMCT accessibilities averaged over 18 and 12 measurements, respectively; measurements were made over 4 days and 3 independent preparations. SHAPE (NMIA) accessibilities averaged over 14 measurements spread over 3 days and 2 independent preparations. Auxiliary sequences are marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB RNASEP_SHP_0000
item.description: Results after 10 iterations of Maximum Likelihood Estimation (see Aviran et al. PNAS 2011). References: J. B. Lucks et al., Multiplexed RNA structure characterization with selective 2'-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension sequencing (SHAPE-Seq), Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA, 2011;S. Aviran et al., Modeling and automation of sequencing-based characterization of RNA structure, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA, 2011 You can find the raw data in the Gene Expression Omnibus site here

item.title: RMDB RNASEP_SHP_0001
item.description: Barcode validation of Ribonuclease P specificity domain, B. subtilis with 256 different barcodes References: J. B. Lucks et al., Multiplexed RNA structure characterization with selective 2'-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension sequencing (SHAPE-Seq), Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA, 2011;S. Aviran et al., Modeling and automation of sequencing-based characterization of RNA structure, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA, 2011 You can find the raw data in the Gene Expression Omnibus site here

item.title: RMDB GLYCFN_KNK_0001
item.description: Glycine riboswitch chemical mapping to validate structured linker between glycine aptamers, including a kink-turn. See "Automated RNA Structure Prediction Uncovers a Kink-Turn Linker in Double Glycine Riboswitches", Kladwang, Chou, Das, JACS. Auxiliary sequences marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB GLYCFN_KNK_0001
item.description: Glycine riboswitch chemical mapping to validate structured linker between glycine aptamers, including a kink-turn. See "Automated RNA Structure Prediction Uncovers a Kink-Turn Linker in Double Glycine Riboswitches", Kladwang, Chou, Das, JACS. Auxiliary sequences marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB GLYCFN_KNK_0002
item.description: Thermodynamics analysis of structured linker between glycine aptamers: glycine titrations. One of 2-3 replicates. See "Automated RNA Structure Prediction Uncovers a Kink-Turn Linker in Double Glycine Riboswitches", Kladwang, Chou, Das, JACS. Auxiliary sequences marked in lowercase.

item.title: RMDB TRP4P6_HRF_0003
item.description: Data taken by R. Das, 2004, with 32P-end-labeled P4-P6 RNA. Focused Mg(2+) titration in high [NaCl] background ("expt 104E") Footprinted with 0.1 mM Fe(NH4)(SO4)2, 0.125 mM EDTA, and 10 mM sodium ascorbate Quantitated in SAFA. Published in: Das, R., Travers, K.J., Bai, Y., and Herschlag, D. (2005). "Determining the Mg2+ stoichiometry for folding an RNA's metal ion core", Journal of the American Chemical Society 127, 8272-8273
